description: Short on time, but in need of peace? These 30-minute rituals offer a quick yet powerful reset — calming the body, quieting the mind, and restoring inner balance.

description: At the heart of Lushai lies this collection of holistic experiences, shaped by culture, rhythm, and intention. Each ritual is designed to awaken the senses, release tension, and restore inner harmony through skilled touch and aromatic oils.

treatments.name: Swedish Flow
treatments.description: Classic massage techniques to release tension and promote deep relaxation and overall wellness.

treatments.name: Deep Tissue Therapy
treatments.description: Focused work on deep muscle layers to relieve chronic tension and restore flexibility.
